title: Draven Draven
body:
Does anyone know when the Draven Draven skin will be back? 

I'm so annoyed i missed it!!!!

replies.body: The skin isn't coming back, it happened to Urf the Manatee on April Fools, they sold it for 90% off and never brought it back ever, so the same thing applies to Draven Draven

i would pay 12,000 RP for this skin. 

@Riot - you hear me!! RE LIST IT!!!! Xmas SPECIAL! for a special price of 12,000RP !!!
usually those skins are back around April Fools
I know this is a dumb question but will it get the same sale as it did this year? Cause having to spend (I think) 5000 RP seems ridiculous, lol.
